title: AZ 64-E (Desert View Drive) and Hermit Road CLOSED due to winter weather
description: AZ 64-E (Desert View Drive) and Hermit Rd. closed until further notice due to hazardous winter conditions. For latest updates, call the NPS Road Alerts line at: 928-638-7496.

title: Critical Backcountry Updates/Closures
description: Visit the link for the inner canyon weather forecast, current closures, today's heat risk, and drinking water availability.

title: What's Closed and What's Open on South Rim
description: Visit this link for a list of the available visitor services in Grand Canyon Village and at Desert View.
